mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_product_lot(ds_product_lot.read_pro_lot_num, ds_product_lot.machining_code, ds_product_lot.feature_code, ds_product_lot.weight_code, ds_product_lot.grade_code, ds_product_lot.manu_date, ds_product_lot.shelf_life, ds_product_lot.stor_condition, ds_product_lot.pro_stan_code, ds_product_lot.food_manu_licen, ds_product_lot.client, ds_product_lot.un_client, ds_product_lot.client_addr, ds_product_lot.un_client_addr, ds_product_lot.client_phone, ds_product_lot.un_client_phone, ds_product_lot.manu_origin, ds_product_lot.brand_logo, ds_product_lot.pro_lot_num, ds_product_lot.sum_new_act_num, ds_product_lot.classes_code, ds_product_lot.breed_code, ds_product_lot.lgcs_code, ds_product_lot.supp_code, ds_product_lot.norms_code, ds_product_lot.half_period) VALUES(#{readProLotNum},#{machiningCode},#{featureCode},#{weightCode},#{gradeCode},#{manuDate},#{shelfLife},#{storCondition},#{proStanCode},#{foodManuLicen},#{client},#{unClient},#{clientAddr},#{unClientAddr},#{clientPhone},#{unClientPhone},#{manuOrigin},#{brandLogo},#{proLotNum},#{sumNewActNum},#{classesCode},#{breedCode},#{lgcsCode},#{suppCode},#{normsCode},#{halfPeriod})
mapper.select: SELECT slenterprise.EP_NAME as suppName, slseller.SL_CODE as suppCode FROM sl_seller slseller, sl_enterprise slenterprise WHERE slseller.EP_ID = slenterprise.EP_ID
SELECT md_logistics_area.LGCS_AREA_NAME as lgcsName, md_logistics_area.LGCS_AREA_CODE as lgcsCode FROM md_logistics_area

SELECT mdlogisticsarea.LGCS_AREA_NAME as lgcsName, slseller.LGCS_AREA_CODE as lgcsCode, slenterprise.EP_NAME as suppName, slseller.SL_CODE as suppCode FROM sl_seller slseller, sl_enterprise slenterprise, md_logistics_area mdlogisticsarea WHERE slseller.LGCS_AREA_CODE = mdlogisticsarea.LGCS_AREA_CODE AND slseller.EP_ID = slenterprise.EP_ID AND slseller.SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}
SELECT ds_product_lot.PRO_LOT_NUM as proLotNum FROM ds_product_lot WHERE ds_product_lot.PRO_LOT_NUM = #{proLotNum}

SELECT slpdbrand.BRAND_ID as brandId, slseller.SL_CODE_MANUFACTURE as slCodeManufacture FROM sl_seller slseller, sl_pd_brand slpdbrand WHERE slseller.SL_CODE = slpdbrand.SL_CODE AND slseller.SL_CODE = #{suppCode}
